pages.text: When mining in the $(bold)Void$(), one may come across a $(bold)$(6)Forlorn Stone$(). These stones are the children of all the darkness and hopelessness that the void is, having a never ending suffering within them. Some say that by using a $(d)Bag of Mircanter's Dust$(), one could lighten their burden...

When the $(d)Forlorn Stone's$() burden is lifted, when the stone is mined, it will give you a $(bold)$(6)Glimmer of Hope$(). If right-clicked, it will be consumed and give you powerful effects for a few minutes, though it would be wiser to save it for later purposes...
